Class StaffDataController

java.lang.Object
staff.StaffDataController
Direct Known Subclasses:
StaffController
public class StaffDataController extends Object
Bridges the staff backend functionalities, staff user interface and staff database

  • Method Details

    • addNewStaff

      public static void addNewStaff(Map<String,Staff> staffMap, String staffDetailsPath) throws IOException
      Adds a new staff member into the database. This method should only be called by the manager class.
      Parameters:
      staffMap - A map containing staff details.
      staffDetailsPath - The file path to store staff details.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • loadStaffDetails

      public static Map<String,Staff> loadStaffDetails(String staffDetailsPath) throws IOException
      Loads all staff details from the database.
      Parameters:
      staffDetailsPath - The file path to load staff details from.
      Returns:
      A map containing staff details.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • updateClockIn

      public static void updateClockIn(String attendanceSheetPath, Staff staffMember) throws IOException
      Sets the clock-in time to the current time and date for a staff member.
      Parameters:
      attendanceSheetPath - The file path of the attendance sheet.
      staffMember - The staff member to update.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • updateClockOut

      public static void updateClockOut(String attendanceSheetPath, Staff staffMember) throws IOException
      Updates the clock-out time to the current time and date for a staff member.
      Parameters:
      attendanceSheetPath - The file path of the attendance sheet.
      staffMember - The staff member to update.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
